NK080(wu)002:1: // m+aa y+aa dza la ra t+na pra b+h+aa d+ai ba n+aa ma bi ha ra ti sma ////
NK080(wu)002:2: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rin po che'i 'od snang zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK080(wu)002:4: m+aa y+aa dz+aa la rat+na pra b+h+aa d+ai pa n+aa ma /
NK080(wu)002:6: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rin chen 'od kyi snang ba zhes bya ba /
NK080(wu)002:7: ma byas rang byung rdo rje sku gsung thugs //
NK080(wu)002:8: rgyu rkyen rang snang rdo rje 'dus mi byas //
NK080(wu)002:9: snang stong mi phyed rtag chen rdo rje sku //
NK080(wu)002:10: skad cig ma bskyed rdo rje skye 'jig med //
NK080(wu)002:11: bdag gsal mtha' bral rdo rje gzung 'dzin 'jams //
NK080(wu)002:12: ma 'ongs mi 'gro rtog bral rang rig sems //
NK080(wu)002:13: dngos gcig mthar rdzogs rang bzhin kun tu gsal //
NK080(wu)002:14: tha snyad bye brag rtsa ba kun gzhir 'dus //
NK080(wu)002:15: yul dang bral bas rtog med byang chub sems //
NK080(wu)002:16: rang bzhin phrin las mchog 'gyur dpa' bo che //
NK080(wu)002:17: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la gnyis med 'dud //
NK080(wu)002:18: kun brjod mngon byung nges pa'i lung //
NK080(wu)002:19: gsang ba gnyis bcings bzhis chod mos don du /
NK080(wu)002:20: thun mong ma yin sgrol bral gab pa'i rgyud //
NK080(wu)002:21: gzhi la gzhir snang mtshan nyid btag pa yang //
NK080(wu)002:22: log rtog drug sbas sgyu 'phrul ris ma phye //
NK080(wu)002:23: mtshan gzhi ma mthong mun rdzas lta bur gam //
NK080(wu)002:24: blo chung cig tshugs mtshan mchog ril por 'dzin //
NK080(wu)002:25: nang ris gnas skabs gsal phyir mtshan bshad bya //
NK080(wu)002:26: khyad 'phags mtha' dbus med pa'i gnas mchog tu //
NK080(wu)002:27: brgyad dang bcu gcig gcig rdzogs khri brten nas //
NK080(wu)002:28: rang bzhin 'od gsal ma gos 'bras bu rdzogs //
NK080(wu)002:29: rdo rje 'chang chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas //
NK080(wu)002:30: spyi rgyal bdag nyid bdun dang ldan pa la //
NK080(wu)002:31: gsang sngags bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
NK080(wu)002:32: khyad par dris lan mi mngon don gyis zhus //
NK080(wu)002:33: lhan cig rig dang gang zag rnam gsum la //
NK080(wu)002:34: bshad snang rgyud snang nges pa'i yul gsum du //
NK080(wu)002:35: nyi zla chu dang brag cha nyi shar bzhin //
NK080(wu)002:36: gsung lnga rdzogs pa'i rlabs snang bshad bsdus rgyud //
NK080(wu)002:37: ngo bo nyid dang bshad bsdus nges par grags //
NK080(wu)002:38: gser dang me long chu zla'i rmi lam bzhis //
NK080(wu)002:39: mtshan nyid ngo bo bde gshegs 'dus 'khrul phyir //
NK080(wu)002:40: rang bzhin log dang thabs 'bras rkyen bzhi yis //
NK080(wu)002:41: rgyu gcig mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs //
NK080(wu)002:42: snang bzhis mtshan pa shes pa bzhi la snang //
NK080(wu)002:43: de phyir sgyu 'phrul bzhi yi mtshan nyid rnams //
NK080(wu)002:44: phyag rgya bzhi yi rtags dang ldan pa'i mis //
NK080(wu)002:45: so so'i skabs su nang ris phyed par bya //
NK080(wu)002:46: thams cad ma bcos rang rig sgyu ma ni //
NK080(wu)002:47: dngos po phyi nang ngo bo nyid du 'khrul //
NK080(wu)002:48: gsum par snang yang bdag phyir gnyis med 'brel //
NK080(wu)002:49: gtan tshigs rgyas pa bka' las snang ba brtag /phung po 'byung ba khams sogs thabs snang ba //
NK080(wu)002:50: thabs nyid snang ba rig phyir sgyu ma las //
NK080(wu)002:51: ye shes phyag rgya sna tshogs 'khrul pa yin //
NK080(wu)002:52: don rtags tshul du 'brel kyang drug pa'o //
NK080(wu)002:53: thams cad rdzogs 'brel rgyud bzhi dang pa'i dpe //
NK080(wu)002:54: ngo bo gnyis bral rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul yin //
NK080(wu)002:55: rang bzhin nyid rgyu rkyen bdun 'khrul pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:56: rmi lam tshul gyis log pa'i sgyu 'phrul gsum //
NK080(wu)002:57: mi mthun 'dus byas rdzas kyi sgyu ma la //
NK080(wu)002:58: gsum pa'i gnyis por sbyor ba'i thabs dag gis //
NK080(wu)002:59: slu byed rta glang la sog gzugs su 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:60: gnyen po'i dpe yis gnyis pa'i tshul du 'brel //
NK080(wu)002:61: rtogs gsum mtha' skye skad cig sgyu ma las //
NK080(wu)002:63: dra mig 'dug pa'i tshul 'brel lnga pa yin //
NK080(wu)002:64: skad cig don ltar snang yang dngos gzhi med //
NK080(wu)002:65: gsum pa yin te gzhan dbang snang ba yang //
NK080(wu)002:66: chos bzhis brtan byas kun rdzob bden pa ste //
NK080(wu)002:67: 'dus snang don byed shing rta sgyu tsam la //
NK080(wu)002:68: chos dang ldan pa'i ming gi rnam par 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:69: gdags dang gdags gzhi'i tshul 'brel bdun pa yin //
NK080(wu)002:70: bde gshegs snying po rang rig snying po las //
NK080(wu)002:71: log pa gsum gyi rkyen gyis brtags pa yis //
NK080(wu)002:72: drug sogs don gyi dngos po red pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:73: de ming log pa'i sgyu 'phru la zhes brjod do //
NK080(wu)002:74: gtan tshigs rgyas shing bka' las snang ba brtag /log gsum 'khrul byas bdag zhal ma mthong phyir //
NK080(wu)002:75: grol thabs lam gnyis rkyen gyi sgyu 'phrul brjod //
NK080(wu)002:76: shes rab gsum gyis shes bya brtar gcad phyir //
NK080(wu)002:77: so sor rtog pa gzugs bral sgyu ma yis //
NK080(wu)002:78: dag mnyam la sogs tshad ma bkas btsal nas //
NK080(wu)002:79: lhag par mthong ba kun dang shes rab 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:80: gsum pa'i tshul du 'brel dang ngo bo gcig /sgom lam gdul bya'i dbang gis gnyis bstan chos //
NK080(wu)002:81: de ni nyid dang mtshan mar rgyud las grags //
NK080(wu)002:82: rang rig skad cig gzugs bral glang chen sems //
NK080(wu)002:83: med pa gnyis ldan sgyu ma'i ngo bo las //
NK080(wu)002:84: ji bzhin btang snyoms ting 'dzin phyag rgyar bstan //
NK080(wu)002:85: ci yang med la ci yang 'phrul pa 'byung //
NK080(wu)002:86: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i lam gyis rim pa yis //
NK080(wu)002:87: mi bskyed la sogs sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs pa //
NK080(wu)002:88: dkyil 'khor sgyu ma'i rang bzhin chu zla mtshungs //
NK080(wu)002:89: phyag rgya rgyan dang cha lugs 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:90: drug par gyur dang gcig dang du mar med //
NK080(wu)002:91: 'bras bu lam du byas nas mnyam pa yang //
NK080(wu)002:92: de yi rtogs pa dngas nas snang ba'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:93: rkyen gyi sgyu 'phrul nyid du brjod pa'o //
NK080(wu)002:94: rang bzhin dngos po mngon du bya ba'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:95: lam gnyis gdams ngag steng sgo drug sogs pa //
NK080(wu)002:96: thob dang bul dang log pa'i mtshan nyid te //
NK080(wu)002:97: gzhan las thabs gzhan ting 'dzin chags pa'i rgyu //
NK080(wu)002:98: dkyil 'khor sgyu mas bde 'phrul gnyis pa'i tshul //
NK080(wu)002:99: lnga tshul mngon sum bde bar rang las 'byung //
NK080(wu)002:100: 'og sgo gnyis kyis sems rim sgyu ma ni //
NK080(wu)002:101: dbang po yul sems ldan na brtse brgyad gnyis //
NK080(wu)002:102: bcu gcig skabs kyi rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya dang //
NK080(wu)002:103: ye shes bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mchog gi 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:104: lnga pa lta bur 'brel kyang rgyu 'bras med //
NK080(wu)002:105: 'phrul lnga 'dus sogs rang bzhin thabs chen te //
NK080(wu)002:106: thabs mchog steng 'og gnyis kyis mngon byas pas //
NK080(wu)002:107: sa gsum 'bras bu de yis snang ba'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:108: de yang de yi mtshan du grags pa yin //
NK080(wu)002:109: gtan tshigs rgyas shing bka' las snang ba brtag /thabs
NK080(wu)002:110: kyis gar dbang rdzas kyis dmag tu sprul pa ltar
NK080(wu)002:111: // phung sogs nang ris sgyu ma'i tshogs bdag ni //
NK080(wu)002:112: thabs las thabs byung sgyu 'phrul gnyis su gsungs //
NK080(wu)002:113: mi dmigs thugs kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor las //
NK080(wu)002:114: dag mnyam rtogs nas ting 'dzin dbang bsgyur bas //
NK080(wu)002:115: mngon sum ye shes nyid la nyid snang bas //
NK080(wu)002:116: bsam gyis mi khyab sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub //
NK080(wu)002:117: lta bur ltung ba ra snang bas rgyu 'bras med //
NK080(wu)002:118: mngon byas thabs kyi bde gshegs 'bras bu'i rgyud //
NK080(wu)002:119: log dag gnyis med 'brel pa gsum gyi phyir //
NK080(wu)002:120: gsum pa'i snang ba chu zla sgyu ma'i tshul //
NK080(wu)002:121: gang la gang gis mi mthun sna tshogs 'phrul //
NK080(wu)002:122: sku mchog rdo rje ngo bo'i 'od snang ba //
NK080(wu)002:123: mthun pa'i ye shes yul bral rang snang ba'o //
NK080(wu)002:124: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus dang yul snang ba //
NK080(wu)002:125: rnam rtog gnas nas mthun pa'i las snang ste //
NK080(wu)002:126: las dang thugs rjer 'brel kyang bdag po'i tshul //
NK080(wu)002:127: rang bzhin de nyid rkyen gyis mngon byas pa //
NK080(wu)002:128: 'phrul pa dag nas rang snang ba yi phyir //
NK080(wu)002:129: kun mkhyen 'dzin bral sgyu ma'i sprul pa'i phyir //
NK080(wu)002:130: khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul mtshan nyid do //
NK080(wu)002:131: gtan 'dzin rgyas shing bka' las snang ba brtag /rgya mtsho'i gling la rin chen nor bsdus ltar //
NK080(wu)002:132: lung chen klong nas sgyu 'phrul mtshan bsdus pa /
NK080(wu)002:133: nongs 'khrul mkhas dang 'phags la bzod par gsol //
NK080(wu)002:134: dge rtsa rnal 'byor dam can rnams la bsngo //
